SEARCH
Package com.fortisbank.contracts.collections

Class TransactionList

java.lang.Object
java.util.AbstractCollection<Transaction>
java.util.AbstractList<Transaction>
java.util.ArrayList<Transaction>
com.fortisbank.contracts.collections.TransactionList
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Iterable<Transaction>, Collection<Transaction>, List<Transaction>, RandomAccess, SequencedCollection<Transaction>
public class TransactionList extends ArrayList<Transaction>
A typed list for managing Transaction objects. Provides sorting and filtering methods for transactions.
See Also:
